description.plain:
NewJeans (뉴진스) is a South Korean teenage girl group, which debuted on July 22, 2022 under ADOR. It consists of five members: Hanni, Minji, Danielle, Haerin, and Hyein.

In July 2019, HYBE (then BigHit Entertainment) announced that Min Hee Jin will join the company and will lead a new girl group project held together by BigHit and Source Music via the Plus Global Audition. In late 2021, HYBE revealed that the group will debut in 2022 under the new independent subsidiary label, ADOR, and Min as the CEO of it.

As a part of their pre-debut activities, several group members were active in the entertainment industry, including Hyein being a member of Play With Me Club, while Hanni and Minji appeared in the music video for BTS' “Permission to Dance”.

On July 22, 2022, “Attention” was released as NewJeans' debut song. Following that, the group released their second lead track, “Hype Boy,” and a B-side, “Hurt.”

The group released their debut, eponymous EP and the third lead single from it, “Cookie,” on August 1, 2022. With the EP, they set the record for the highest opening week sales for a girl group’s debut album in South Korea (over 300,000 album sales in the first week of its release).

Following their debut, NewJeans won 2022 The Fact Music Award in a Next Leader category and were also nominated for Best Female Rookie award at the 2022 Genie Music Awards.

On October 18 of the same year, ADOR confirmed that the group was preparing for their first-ever comeback. The pre-release single, “Ditto,” was released the next day on December 19, along with two music videos and followed later on by their first album, OMG.

body.plain:
NewJeans (뉴진스) is a South Korean teenage girl group, which debuted on July 22, 2022 under ADOR. It consists of five members: Hanni, Minji, Danielle, Haerin, and Hyein.

In July 2019, HYBE (then BigHit Entertainment) announced that Min Hee Jin will join the company and will lead a new girl group project held together by BigHit and Source Music via the Plus Global Audition. In late 2021, HYBE revealed that the group will debut in 2022 under the new independent subsidiary label, ADOR, and Min as the CEO of it.

As a part of their pre-debut activities, several group members were active in the entertainment industry, including Hyein being a member of Play With Me Club, while Hanni and Minji appeared in the music video for BTS' “Permission to Dance”.

On July 22, 2022, “Attention” was released as NewJeans' debut song. Following that, the group released their second lead track, “Hype Boy,” and a B-side, “Hurt.”

The group released their debut, eponymous EP and the third lead single from it, “Cookie,” on August 1, 2022. With the EP, they set the record for the highest opening week sales for a girl group’s debut album in South Korea (over 300,000 album sales in the first week of its release).

Following their debut, NewJeans won 2022 The Fact Music Award in a Next Leader category and were also nominated for Best Female Rookie award at the 2022 Genie Music Awards.

On October 18 of the same year, ADOR confirmed that the group was preparing for their first-ever comeback. The pre-release single, “Ditto,” was released the next day on December 19, along with two music videos and followed later on by their first album, OMG.

songs.full_title: Ditto by NewJeans (뉴진스)
songs.title: Ditto

description.plain:
“Ditto” serves as the pre-release single from NewJeans' first single album, OMG.

The lyrics for the track describe an inner discussion of a person falling in love right away, remiscent of being hit with Cupid’s arrow and who also tries their best to bravely show the affection to a significant one through a honest confession, while hoping for a pure and requited relationship.

Despite the sweet and vulnerable meaning, the Shin Wooseok-directed ‘side A’ and ‘side B’ music videos for “Ditto” revolve on a divergent story, as they are shot from the perspective of Heesoo (played by Park Jihu), a close friend and schoolmate of NewJeans.

The former shows the carefree and joyful life of the mysterious character and the group, which goes through an unexpected change after Heesoo’s arm is injuried and is hallucinating about her moments with imaginary friends, while the latter continues the storyline of the video and reveals how the actual, yet ideal mindset of the girl looks like.

The lyrics for the track describe an inner discussion of a person falling in love right away, remiscent of being hit with Cupid’s arrow and who also tries their best to bravely show the affection to a significant one through a honest confession, while hoping for a pure and requited relationship.

Despite the sweet and vulnerable meaning, the Shin Wooseok-directed ‘side A’ and ‘side B’ music videos for “Ditto” revolve on a divergent story, as they are shot from the perspective of Heesoo (played by Park Jihu), a close friend and schoolmate of NewJeans.

The former shows the carefree and joyful life of the mysterious character and the group, which goes through an unexpected change after Heesoo’s arm is injuried and is hallucinating about her moments with imaginary friends, while the latter continues the storyline of the video and reveals how the actual, yet ideal mindset of the girl looks like.

songs.full_title: OMG by NewJeans (뉴진스)
songs.title: OMG

description.plain:
Based on hip-hop drum source and percussion, OMG is a bouncy and exciting hip-hop R&B song created by going back and forth between UK Garage and Trap rhythms, and it is the title song of this album.

New Jeans' unique trendy tone is expressed in various styles such as Pop Vocal and Melodic Rap, so you can see another personality and charm.

songs.full_title: Attention by NewJeans (뉴진스)
songs.title: Attention

description.plain:
“Attention” marks the debut of South Korean group, NewJeans, the first girl group under HYBE’s independent subsidiary, ADOR and furthermore, it serves as one of three title tracks off of their eponymous mini album.

The groovy and rhythmic song tells about the thrill and excitement of love as also enchantment. It is also a moment for the members of the group who make a heartfelt confession for the listeners about being meant to be with the one who they adore as also keeping the closure between each other.

The song became a commercial and critical success and earned the group the Best K-Pop Song Award at the prestigious 20th Korean Music Awards.

The song became a commercial and critical success and earned the group the Best K-Pop Song Award at the prestigious 20th Korean Music Awards.
